DOC.brief_summary: Pre-diabetes , type 2 diabetes , related condition , adiposity insulin resistance , prevalent minority Northern Manhattan compare general population United States . Despite knowledge main biologic determinant condition ( high caloric intake sedentarism ) prevalence condition continue increase . In addition , condition cause mental health problem include increase depressive symptom cognitive impairment . Thus , investigator decide conduct community base study middle age Hispanic men woman age 50 64 year baseline order : 1 . Document prevalence incidence , pre-diabetes , diabetes , overweight , obesity , associate condition ( e.g . dyslipidemia , hypertension ) . 2 . Study social determinant health ( SDOH ) affect condition . 3 . Study consequence condition age mental health outcome , include cognitive impairment .
DOC.detailed_description: DESIGN OVERVIEW : Northern Manhattan Study Metabolism Mind ( NOMEM ) longitudinal cohort study middle age Hispanics . Recruitment initial cohort 600 participant complete January 2012 December 2013 . Our total target sample size 1000 participant . Participants follow every 2 year . Participants self-identified Hispanic men woman age 50 65 year . The sampling frame community Northern Manhattan New York City . Participants undergo phlebotomy , measurement vital sign anthropometric measure , interview medical history , cognitive assessment , interview social determinant health mental physical condition . Assessments take 2 3 hour . VARIABLES : - Glycemia diabetes status : glycemia measure HbA1c . Diabetes define clinical history HbA1c ≥ 6.5 % , follow 2010 ADA criterion . Pre-diabetes determine follow ADA 2010 criterion ( HbA1c 5.7 6.4 % ) . - APOE genotyping : The 3 APOE allele genotyped , ε2 , ε3 , ε4 . - Body Mass Index ( BMI ) . Standing height measure use stadiometer calibrate cm . Body weight measure use balance beam scale calibrate kg . With participant standing , measurement take nearest 0.1 kg weight balance scale height without shoe nearest 0.5 cm , calculate BMI ( weight/height2 ) . ( use : covariate , ancillary study ) . - Demographic variable : We collect date birth , sex , year education , racial group , country origin ( follow 2010 census format Hispanics ) ( use : covariates ) . - Depression : We measure depression depressive symptom use PHQ9 PROMIS depression scale . - High sensitivity CRP : Measured use ELISA ( Diagnostic system laboratory , INC , Webster , Texas ) . The assay sensitivity 1.6 ng/ml , inter-assay CV 11.7 % , intra-assay CV 4.6 % . This assay conduct serum plasma . - Lipids : total cholesterol ( TC ) , HDL . TC HDL measure use enzymatic colorimetric method ( Vitros ; Johnson & Johnson , New Brunswick , NJ ) . - Medical history.This include vascular disease , cancer , smoke - Medications : We record medication , vitamin , counter product ( use : covariate , ancillary study ) . - Resting blood pressure ( BP ) : BP measure use automate oscillometric device ; 3 measurement obtain 1-minute interval seat position 5 minute rest . The average 2nd 3rd measurement record BP . - Waist hip circumference : Waist circumference measure level umbilicus . Hip circumference measure level maximal protrusion gluteal muscle . Waist-hip ratio calculate ratio waist circumference hip circumference . - Cognitive battery : - WAIS-R Similarities . This Wechsler Adult Intelligence Scale-Revised subtest good norm standard portion dementia evaluation . The item translate Spanish scoring guide develop . Age-Scaled score use . [ Max . Score=19 ; Time=5 min ] Non-Verbal Similarities . The Identities Oddities subtest Mattis Dementia Rating Scale use assess nonverbal abstract reason . [ Max . Score=16 ; Time=2 min ] - Color Trails Test Color Trails 1 test sustain visual attention , psychomotor speed , simple sequence involves connect circle contain number 1 25 order quickly possible . Color Trails 2 also involve connect circle contain number 1 25 order quickly possible , examinee must shift pink yellow color circle . Like Part 1 , Color Trails 2 ass visual attention psychomotor speed also require high level executive function skill . - Verbal Fluency : Controlled Word Association Test . The patient give 1 min name many word begin particular letter s/he . Norms frequency count exist test Spanish well English . Three category , Animals , Food , Clothing administer assess category naming . [ Time=7 min ] - The Selective Reminding Test ( SRT ) standard tool assessment verbal memory dementia use sensitive longitudinal measure change memory function . The SRTwas translate Spanish use word similar frequency standard test version . Subjects give 6 trial learn list 12 unrelated word . After attempt recall list , subject remind word recall must attempt recall entire list . To assess short-term memory , 2 measure use : total recall ( max . score=72 ) retrieval long-term storage ( max . score=72 ) . To assess long-term recall , delay recall assess 15 minute complete SRT ( max . score=12 ) ; recognition word recall test use multiple choice array ( max . score=12 ) . [ Time ( include 15 min . delay interval , test administer ) =15 min ] . - The orientation item modify Mini-Mental State Examination use assess orientation time place . These item sensitive dementing change normative sample . [ Max . Score=10 ; Time administer=2 min ] - Social Determinants Health : - Individual SES : MacArthur Network SES Health Measures Household income/number people support , wealth , debt , long one could live current lifestyle current source income cease - Perceived Social Status : MacArthur Ladder ; Perceived relative stand US - Migration : Age migration Years life US - Everyday Discrimination* Everyday Discrimination ; 10 item ; Daily discriminatory hassle - Major Discrimination* Modified Experiences Discrimination Scale : 12 item ; Frequency measure total lifetime occurrence ; 0=Never 5=Four More Times - Coping Discrimination—Psychosocial Experiences Discrimination Scale ; 3 cop styles—0=Passive ( accept/quiet ) ; 1=Moderate ( quiet ) ; 2=Engaged ( something/talk others ) - Coping Discrimination—Health Behavior Modified Experiences Discrimination Scale 4 behaviors—Exercising , eat sweets/fatty food , drink alcohol , smoke cigarette 0=Never ; 3=most time - Coping Stress—Psychosocial Based Experiences Discrimination Scale 3 cop styles—0=Passive ( accept/quiet ) ; 1=Moderate ( quiet ) ; 2=Engaged ( something/talk others ) - Coping Stress—Health Behavior Modified Experiences Discrimination Scale 4 behaviors—Exercising , eat sweets/fatty food , drink alcohol , smoke cigarette ; 0=Never ; 3=most time - Racial/Ethnic Socialization Racial/Ethnic Socialization Scale 15 item ; 0=Never , 1=Almost Never ; 2=Sometimes ; 3=Often ; 4=Very Often - Ethnic Identity Multi-Ethnic Identity Measure 12 item Affirmation Belonging Ethnic Identity Search subscales - Acculturation Bidimensional Acculturation Scale Average 12 item domain ( Hispanic , Non-Hispanic ) - Alcohol Use Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test 10 item ; Items score 0-4 - Smoking From COHD battery Cigarettes smoke daily - Diet Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System 6 item ; 1=More Once Day ; 5=Less Once Week - Physical Activity IPAQ Summation duration ( minute ) frequency ( day ) walking , moderate-intensity vigorous-intensity activity estimate MET minutes/week - Barriers Exercise* Benefits Barriers Exercise71 9 item ; 0=Never ; 5=Very Often - John Henryism John Henryism Active Coping Scale 12 item ; 1=Completely True ; 5=Completely False - Social Support Social Support Questionnaire Count # people odd item . Add total ( Max=54 ) . Divide 6 per item SSQ Number Score . Add total Satisfaction score 6 even numbered item - Neighborhood Resources Census-derived neighborhood deprivation % live poverty line
